basic.description:
A study of discourse on and by women in representative works (primarily the novel). Travaux pratiques may include essays and tests.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Genre et littérature

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite       (FREN230 and FREN241) or FREN221 or (FREN220 and FREN212).
Exclusion     No more than 3.0 units from FREN390 or FREN490.
